subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Charles Jenkins, a senior guard at Hofstra, won the Haggerty Award, given to the outstanding college basketball player in the New York metropolitan area, for the third straight year.
snippet: Charles Jenkins, a senior guard at Hofstra, won the Haggerty Award, given to the outstanding college basketball player in the New York metropolitan area, for the third straight year.
